summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting a judicial opinion from Judge Nathan addressing pretrial motions in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The opinion appears to resolve multiple legal issues before trial.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued a judicial opinion addressing pretrial motions in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the pretrial motions addressed in Judge Nathan's opinion.

connections.description: Judge Nathan issued a judicial opinion addressing pretrial motions in Maxwell's case.

events.title: Judge Nathan Issues Pretrial Opinion
events.description: Judge Nathan issued an opinion addressing almost all of the pretrial motions that had been litigated in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Judge Nathan issued a significant pretrial opinion in the Ghislaine Maxwell case on April 16, 2021.
The opinion addressed almost all of the pretrial motions that had been litigated.
The document was transmitted by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The opinion appears to have been a major procedural step before Maxwell's trial.
